description: Listed Building Consent application in connection with external and internal alterations. Notable alterations include, the replacement of an existing single storey rear extension with a new extension, reinstatement of original Georgian sash windows to the front elevation, alterations to the windows on the rear elevation of the building, introduction of a steel staircase to front lightwell of the building and the reconfiguration of internal rooms and creation of new openings, retention and renovation of internal fixtures and features and alteration of floor levels within the 5 storey non original extension.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Notwithstanding the approved plans, the front vault shall not be tanked. It shall be dry lined instead.  These works are to be carried prior to the completion of the development and permanently maintained as such thereafter.

REASON: Protect the character and fabric of the statutory listed building.
